data.name: CyberDrifter Demo
data.detailed_description:
After an AI program has gone rogue and became fully self-aware, enter the Cyberdrifter's, military trained computer specialists capable of entering systems virtually and taking back control.

Take on your role as a "Cyberdrifter" and prepare to do battle in a virtual world against the rogue AI and regain full system control.

Walk, run, strafe & dodge by pulling the trigger and tilting the motion controller for full "FPS" style VR movement in this fast paced shooter!

Early access content available now:
Tutorial level
Opening level
Level with boss
Score system
(Online leaderboard & the next level are coming soon)

HTC Vive & Oculus Touch 360 compatible.

Music composed by
Nathan Boler
Bensound
teknoaxe

data.short_description:
In a virtual cyberspace world, prepare to do battle against an intelligent rogue AI and it's army of bots.
Infiltrate, shoot and maneuver in the VR shooter featuring full "FPS" movement for fast paced action in full 360 degrees!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
